name: Stargate Bridged USDC (Flow)
description: Stargate Bridged USDC (Flow) is a bridged USDC on Flow blockchain from Solana/Ethereum through Stargate. [Flow](https://flow.com/) is a layer one blockchain designed from the ground up for consumer apps and the digital assets that power them. The network runs on a Proof of Stake consensus mechanism with a unique "multi-role" architecture that solves the blockchain trilemma, balancing scalability, efficiency, and cost.
